abstract.text: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: The watchOS 7 SDK provides support to develop watchOS apps for Apple Watch devices running watchOS 7. The SDK comes bundled with Xcode 12, available from the Mac App Store. For information on the compatibility requirements for Xcode 12, see
Kaleidoscope faces created using the Photos app on watchOS 7 beta 4 or earlier might cause your watch to repeatedly restart unexpectedly. (65224164)
Workaround:
Use the Watch app on your phone to remove the Kaleidoscope face.
Watch faces created using watchOS 7 beta 5 and earlier are no longer compatible with watchOS. Use watchOS 7 beta 6 or later to generate new
If you added a Sleep complication to a Watch face in watchOS 7 beta, it might disappear after updating to watchOS 7 beta 2 or later. (63699282)
Workaround:
Add the Sleep complication again.
The Sleep complication might appear twice in the complication picker when editing a Watch face. (64709508)
Workaround:
Remove the Sleep app, then reinstall it using App Store on your watch.
New APIs are available for using
from Swift as part of the framework
. A new type,
, can be instantiated using a subsystem and category and provides methods for logging at different levels (
The
APIs support specifying most formatting and privacy options supported by legacy
APIs. The new APIs provide significant performance improvements over the legacy APIs. You can now pass Swift string interpolation to the
function.
Note:
The new APIs can’t be back deployed; however, the existing
API remains available for back deployment. (22539144)
metrics support is now available. (29448748)
You might be unable to update Apple Watch Series 3 to watchOS 7 due to limited storage. (64793483)
Workaround:

Unpair your watch, then pair it again with your phone. Set it up as a new watch rather than restoring from a backup. Use General > Software Update in the Watch app to update to watchOS 7. If you want to restore your watch from its latest backup after the update is complete, repeat these steps while choosing to restore from a backup rather than setting up as new.

abstract.text: The content and behavior of the app.
A representation of a color that adapts to a given context.
A control used to select a color from the system color picker UI.
A view that displays an image.
A `PickerStyle` where each option is displayed inline with other views in the current container.
A container that presents rows of data arranged in a single column, optionally providing the ability to select one or more members.
A control for selecting from a set of mutually exclusive values.
A view that shows the progress toward completion of a task.
A view that describes the current value of a progress view.
A view that describes the task represented by the progress view.
A result builder for composing a collection of scenes into a single composite scene.
A view that provides programmatic scrolling, by working with a proxy to scroll to known child views.
A view that displays one or more lines of read-only text.
A model that represents a group of `ToolbarItem`s which can be placed in the toolbar or navigation bar.
A custom parameter attribute that constructs views from closures.
Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
An abstract class that declares an interface for objects that create, interpret, and validate the textual representation of values.
An object that coordinates a group of related, network data transfer tasks.
Coordinate the scheduling and synchronization of your app’s tasks, and log information to the console to diagnose issues.
An object for writing interpolated string messages to the unified logging system.
The Quartz color that corresponds to the color object.
